title: The display property of an item set to 'none' does not take effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not cause the item to be hidden in the new PDF emitter.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Add a label to the document. 2. Open the 'properties' view for the label. 3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none'. 4. Generate the PDF using the new emitter. The label should still be visible in the output.
